packages.name: jsonresume-theme-randytarampi
packages.description: A JSON resume theme for www.randytarampi.ca

scripts.build: yarn run build:copy && yarn run build:webpack && yarn run build:babel
scripts.build:babel:esm: cross-env-shell BABEL_ENV=client.esm babel src --out-dir esm --root-mode upward --copy-files
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist && yarn build:copy:index.pug && yarn build:copy:layout.pug && yarn build:copy:styles.css && cp *.md dist/
scripts.kill:server: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid ]; then echo "Killing server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid; fi;
scripts.prepack: if [ -z "$RELEASE" ] && [ -z "$CI" ] || [ $IS_PUBLISHING ]; then cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=prd yarn run build; fi; if [ ! -d "./dist" ] && [ ! -d "./es5" ] && [ ! -d "./esm" ]; then exit 74; fi;
scripts.prepare: yarn run snyk-protect && yarn run build
scripts.resume: yarn run resume:json && yarn run resume:pdf && yarn run resume:html
scripts.resume:a4: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=A4 cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=a4,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export dist/resume.a4.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp dist/resume.a4.pdf dist/a4.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:html: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=html CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export dist/resume.html --force -f html --theme randytarampi && (cp dist/resume.index dist/index.html 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:json: cp -n $(node -p 'require("path").resolve(require.resolve("@randy.tarampi/resume"), "../../src/resumes/resume.json")') ./resume.json || true; mkdir -p dist; cp resume.json dist/resume.json
scripts.resume:legal: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=Legal cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=legal,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export dist/resume.legal.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp dist/resume.legal.pdf dist/legal.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:letter: RESUME_PDF_SIZE=Letter cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=letter,$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume export dist/resume.letter.pdf --force -f pdf --theme randytarampi && (cp dist/resume.letter.pdf dist/letter.pdf 2>/dev/null || :)
scripts.resume:pdf: yarn run start:server; yarn run resume:letter & yarn run resume:a4 & yarn run resume:legal; yarn run kill:server
scripts.resume:publish: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=html CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") npx resume publish --force --theme $(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name.replace(\"jsonresume-theme-\", \"\")")
scripts.start:server: yarn run kill:server; node ./server.js & echo $! > /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid; echo "Started server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.jsonresume-theme.server.pid";

scripts.create-docs: resume export docs/resume_extended.pdf --resume public/resume_extended.json --format pdf --theme . && resume export docs/resume_simple.pdf --resume public/resume_simple.json --format pdf --theme .

scripts.build: npm run build:clean -s && npm run build:js -s && npm run build:css -s
scripts.pretest: npm run lint -s && npm run build -s
scripts.test: npm run test:unit -s && npm run test:render -s
scripts.report:package: npm pack --loglevel notice 2>&1 >/dev/null | sed -e 's/^npm notice //' | tee dist/package.txt && rm *.tgz
